example.llama_src: Portuges mak linguajen ofisial iha Timor-Leste.
example.llama_tgt: Portuguese is an official language in East Timor.

example.llama_src: Ami respeita veteranu sira ne'ebé servisu iha forsa armada durante funu.
example.llama_tgt: I respect the veterans who served in the armed forces during the war.

example.llama_src: Militar sira uza bomba hodi ataka inimigu sira.
example.llama_tgt: The military used bombs to attack the enemy.

example.llama_src: Ita bele uza tradutór atu ajudá ita tradús dokumentu importante.
example.llama_tgt: You can use a translator to help you translate important documents.

example.llama_src: Ita tenki hatudu profesionalismu iha serbisu nian.
example.llama_tgt: We must show professionalism in our work.

example.llama_src: Ami hakarak partisipa iha assosiasaun ida ne'ebé sei ajuda komunidade.
example.llama_tgt: I want to participate in an association that will help the community.

example.llama_src: Ha'u uza exemplu ida ne'e atu esplika konseitu ne'e.
example.llama_tgt: I use this example to explain the concept.

example.llama_src: Governu tenki kria kampanha edukasaun ba komunidade sira kona-ba HIV-SIDA.
example.llama_tgt: The government needs to create an education campaign for communities about HIV-AIDS.

example.llama_src: Ami la'ó iha duut no sente fresku.
example.llama_tgt: I walked on the grass and felt refreshed.

example.llama_src: Kapasidade másimu ba pasajeiru iha ôtobus ne'e mak 50.
example.llama_tgt: The maximum capacity for passengers on this bus is 50.

example.llama_src: Ami sei halo festa ba aniversáriu husi ami nia inan.
example.llama_tgt: I will throw a party for my mother's anniversary.

example.llama_src: Projetu ida ne'e sei hahu iha inísiu fulan Janeiru.
example.llama_tgt: This project will start at the beginning of January.

example.llama_src: Ha'u hetan formasaun ida iha área saúde no desidu atu serbisu iha ospitál.
example.llama_tgt: I received training in the health sector and decided to work in a hospital.

example.llama_src: Ami uza matadalan ne'e atu ba Dili ha'u.
example.llama_tgt: I used this guide to get to Dili.

example.llama_src: Klube futebol nian kompetisaun iha Dili sei hahu iha fulan Maiu.
example.llama_tgt: The football club competition in Dili will start in May.

example.llama_src: Ami ko'alia ho ema Fijianu iha Dili.
example.llama_tgt: I spoke with a Fijian person in Dili.

example.llama_src: Kompanha marítima ida iha Timor-Leste fornese servisu transportasaun ba iha tasi.
example.llama_tgt: A maritime company in Timor-Leste provides transportation services across the sea.

example.llama_src: Labarik sira halo joga bola iha kampo.
example.llama_tgt: The children are playing ball in the field.

example.llama_src: Sékulu XXI nu'udar sékulu ida ne'ebé teknologia dezenvolve rapidamente.
example.llama_tgt: The 21st century is a century in which technology is developing rapidly.

example.llama_src: Ha'u sai husi uma iha tuku 7.
example.llama_tgt: I leave the house at 7 o'clock.

example.llama_src: Estudante sira iha eskola sekundária aprende matemátika no portugés.
example.llama_tgt: Students in high school learn mathematics and Portuguese.

example.llama_src: Ha dadeer, ami bá iha eskola.
example.llama_tgt: In the morning, I go to school.

example.llama_src: Sira servisu kolektivu hodi atinji objetivu sira-nian.
example.llama_tgt: They work collectively to achieve their objectives.

example.llama_src: Ami konkorda ho plano ne'e.
example.llama_tgt: I agree with this plan.

example.llama_src: Ha'u rona notísia kona-ba eleisaun prezidente foun iha televizaun.
example.llama_tgt: I heard the news about the new presidential election on television.

example.llama_src: Ha'u bele ko'alia Inglés.
example.llama_tgt: I can speak English.

example.llama_src: Órgaun ida ne'e importante ba sistema ne'e nian.
example.llama_tgt: This organ is important for the system's functioning.

example.llama_src: Ami ba parke ho labarik sira atu halo aktividade fiziku.
example.llama_tgt: I went to the park with the kids to do some physical activities.

example.llama_src: Ha'u moris iha domisíliu ida iha Dili.
example.llama_tgt: I live in a residence in Dili.

example.llama_src: Polísia halo interrogatóriu ba suspeitu kona-ba kazu ne'e.
example.llama_tgt: The police conducted questioning of the suspect about the case.

example.llama_src: Kandidata ba eleisaun prezidensiál mai husi partidu polítiku diferente.
example.llama_tgt: The candidate for the presidential election comes from a different political party.

example.llama_src: Governu tenke hadia insidensia kriminalidade iha komunidade.
example.llama_tgt: The government needs to address the incidence of crime in the community.

example.llama_src: Ha'u servisu iha kompañia ida iha Dili.
example.llama_tgt: I work for a company in Dili.

example.llama_src: Ami sae madrugada atu halo orasaun.
example.llama_tgt: I wake up pre-dawn to pray.

example.llama_src: Dezlokadu sira iha Timor-Leste barak mak lakon sira nia uma no hela fatin durante konflitu.
example.llama_tgt: Many displaced persons in Timor-Leste lost their homes and livelihoods during the conflict.

example.llama_src: Bee hau nia fukun ba informasaun ne'e mak hau nia kolega.
example.llama_tgt: The source of this information is my colleague.

example.llama_src: Povu Timor-Leste hakarak rezisténsia hasoru okupasaun Indonézia iha tempu lalu.
example.llama_tgt: The people of Timor-Leste wanted resistance against the Indonesian occupation in the past.

example.llama_src: Kontextu ne'e importante tebes iha diskusaun ida, tanba ambitu ne'e bele muda tuir tempu no mós kondisaun.
example.llama_tgt: The context is very important in a discussion, because it can change over time and also depending on the condition.

example.llama_src: Ami tenki pasa alfándega molok ami tama ba rai seluk.
example.llama_tgt: I need to go through customs before I enter another country.

example.llama_src: Fatin ne'e mutin no liman.
example.llama_tgt: This place is white and clean.

example.llama_src: Ha'u iha tinan 25.
example.llama_tgt: I am 25 years old.

example.llama_src: Ha'u-nia uma iha Dili.
example.llama_tgt: My house is in Dili.

example.llama_src: Ami moris iha rai Timor-Leste.
example.llama_tgt: I was born in the country of Timor-Leste.

example.llama_src: Polisia kaer nia ba komarka tanba nia komete krime.
example.llama_tgt: The police took him to jail because he committed a crime.

example.llama_src: Governu tenki halo aprovizionamentu ba ekipamentu eskola nian.
example.llama_tgt: The government needs to procure equipment for the schools.

example.llama_src: Ha'u sei traduz dokumentu ida ba lian Inglés.
example.llama_tgt: I will translate a document into English.

example.llama_src: Governu dezenvolve programa ida atu hadi'a ekonomia nasional.
example.llama_tgt: The government develops a plan to improve the national economy.

example.llama_src: Governu halo fiskalizasaun ba projesu konstrusaun estrada nasional.
example.llama_tgt: The government conducts inspections on the national road construction project.

example.llama_src: Prosesu ne'e sei remata iha finalizasaun projetu nian.
example.llama_tgt: The process will end with the finalisation of the project.

example.llama_src: Espíritu sira iha kultura Timor-Leste nian importante tebes.
example.llama_tgt: Spirits play a very important role in East Timorese culture.
